Name: Jumpin' Jack Flash
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: Whiskey mellowed and sweetened by a tasty combo of liqueurs and juices.
Nutrition: One serving of Jumpin' Jack Flash contains 201 calories
